name: IQ
public_notice: Everipedia has rebranded to IQ. For detailed information, kindly visit this post.

description.en: The IQ token is a cryptocurrency dedicated to the future of knowledge. The token powers IQ.wiki, the world's largest cryptocurrency encyclopedia. IQ is a DeFi and governance token with stakers earning rewards. The token is managed by BrainDAO and backed by BrainDAO's treasury of IQ tokens, stablecoins, blue chip NFTs, and other digital assets.
